results.name: 'Mo-Wave! Queer music and arts festival
results.overview: Multi-day, multi-venue festival. Fairly simple requirements for a website: 1) to be easy for organizers to manage, update and reorder content as needed; and 2) to be easy for potential festival-goers to learn more about, and purchase tickets for, the weekend's schedule and assortment of performers and events. Festival zine print production and designs.
results.components: Web design, print design, web development

results.name: Swiss Delta
results.components: Technical designs, brand identity, marketing, packaging, website (in progress)
results.overview: An American-designed, Swiss made watch brand, Swiss Delta required watch designs for an inaugural collection spanning several watch functions, a variety of interrelating components, and exacting manufacturing requirements.

gallery.caption: Two-eye chronograph, 42mm, black dial, brushed stainless steel case, polished hardware.
Field watch (three hands / date), 38mm, white dial, brushed ion-plated black stainless steel case, polished hardware.
Three-eye chronograph, 42mm, white dial with black subdials, brushed stainless steel case, polished hardware.
Field watch (three hands), black dial and dial ring, brushed ion-plated black stainless steel case, polished hardware.

results.name: Music Posters
results.overview: Playing in the band Night Cadet has given me many opportunities to make posters for gigs, both for our own shows and for other bands we've played with.

results.name: Tuktu
results.overview: My good friend Ben McAllister needed a libretto for a performance his band Tuktu was giving of a song cycle about the Inuit myth of Qayak. In the process I also created a logo for printing on shirts and other merch.
